name: TAO Minigames
description:
¿Sometimes you wanted to play so much games insine one game? Now you can do it with TAO Minigames.

Note: "If you are on Mac OS X or Linux the in-browser game can have bugs, IDK, I don't have a Mac to test it".

Note: "The TAO Minigames Tools website isn't created yet, when we create it will remove this note".

Some issues that i noted on the in-browser game: 

  • The game doesn't have soung (or I don't hear it).
Current minigames in TAO Minigames

"Tutorial" -The game tutorial.

"Dripeg" -A build-your-base minigame.
